elements.label: Intro
elements.defaultValue: Thank you for your interest in:

elements.defaultValue: {{companyNameConst}} {{sampleCmpAddressConst}}

elements.label: Work History Instructions
elements.defaultValue: Please complete our online operator work history. Incomplete information will delay the processing of your work history or prevent it from being submitted.

elements.label: Time Estimate
elements.defaultValue: This process will take 20-30 minutes, so please make sure you have time to complete this before you get started.

elements.label: Required Information
elements.defaultValue: Required Information
items: Home address history for the past {{homeHistoryConst}} years
Driver's license history for the past {{driveLicHistoryConst}} years
History of traffic accidents from the last {{trafficAccidentsConst}} years

elements.label: Field Requirement Explanation
elements.defaultValue: Required entry fields are followed by *, meaning you must provide the requested information to continue.

elements.label: Contact Information
elements.defaultValue: Contact Information

elements.label: Contact Details
elements.defaultValue: If you have any questions, please contact {{companyNameConst}} at {{personPhoneOrgConst}}.

elements.label: Introduction
elements.defaultValue: To qualify with {{companyNameConst}}, you must meet the following criteria:

elements.label: Owner Operator Minimum Requirements
elements.defaultValue: Owner Operator Minimum Requirements
items: Must be at least {{ageConst}} years old and hold a valid Class A CDL (or Class B for Expedited) with HazMat (H) or combination (X) endorsement.

Have no more than two at-fault accidents and two moving violations within the past 36 months, or no more than one at-fault accident and three moving violations within the same time period. No involvement in preventable DOT-recordable accidents in the past 12 months.

Must have one year (six months for Expedited) of verifiable over-the-road driving experience within the past three years, or two years of verifiable experience in the last five years with a Class A (or Class B for Expedited) CDL operating equipment similar to what will be used at {{companyNameConst}}.
No felony convictions in the past {{felonyConvictionsConst}} years. Other felony or misdemeanor charges will be reviewed on a case-by-case basis.
No positive drug or alcohol test results, including refusals or pre-employment test results.
No suspensions of more than 30 days for moving violations in the last 36 months.
No more than one serious violation, as defined in Table 2 of section 383.51 of the FMCSR handbook, in the previous 36 months prior to qualification.
No railroad-highway grade crossing violations, as defined in Table 3 of section 383.51 of the FMCSR handbook, within the previous 36 months.
No citations or convictions for Reckless Driving or Careless Endangerment during the 36-month period before the MVR order date.
No DUI charges during the 60-month period before the MVR order date, in a personal or non-commercial vehicle, and never in a commercial vehicle.
Must be proficient enough in English to understand highway traffic signs and signals, respond to official inquiries, complete reports and records, and communicate with the public.

elements.label: Insurance Requirements
elements.defaultValue: These are the minimum operator qualification standards subject to DOT requirements, and {{companyNameConst}} may impose more stringent requirements at its discretion. The decision to qualify an operator will be made by {{companyNameConst}} on a case-by-case basis.

elements.label: First Name
elements.validationMessage: First Name must contain only letters.

elements.label: Last Name
elements.validationMessage: Last Name must contain only letters.

elements.label: Email
elements.validationMessage: Please enter a valid email address.

elements.label: Phone Number
elements.validationMessage: Phone Number must contain only digits.

elements.label: I confirm that I have read the terms and conditions.
Yes, I agree to receive information concerning future opportunities or promotions by email or other commercial electronic communications.
License Number
elements.validationMessage: License Number is required and must be alphanumeric.

elements.label: Country*
elements.defaultValue:
Country*

Select the country in which your license was issued from the provided list. This information is required to determine the legal jurisdiction under which your license is valid. Different countries may have varying regulations and licensing standards, so ensuring that your selection is accurate is essential for proper verification. If your country does not appear in the dropdown list, please contact support for assistance in processing your license.

elements.label: State/Province
elements.defaultValue:
State/Province

If applicable, enter the state or province where your license was issued. Use the full official name or the standard abbreviation as it appears on your licensing documents to ensure accuracy. This field is particularly important for countries with regional licensing authorities that have specific regulations. If your license is not tied to a specific state or province, you may leave this field blank. However, if required, providing accurate information here will help speed up the verification process.

elements.label: License Expiration Date*
elements.defaultValue:
License Expiration Date*

Input the expiration date of your license in the required format: MM/DD/YYYY (e.g., 08/15/2025). The expiration date determines how long your license remains valid, and providing an incorrect or outdated date may result in processing delays or restrictions. Be sure to cross-check the date with your official documentation before submitting the form. If your license does not have an expiration date, check with the issuing authority on how to properly complete this section.

elements.label: Medical Expiration Date*
elements.defaultValue:
Medical Expiration Date*

If you have a required medical certification tied to your license, enter the expiration date in MM/DD/YYYY format. This information is necessary to ensure that you meet any health-related licensing requirements. Medical certifications often need periodic renewal, so make sure that the date you enter is up to date. If your certification has expired or is due for renewal soon, consider updating it to prevent any issues with license validation.

elements.label: Is this your current license?
elements.defaultValue:
Is this your current license?

Indicate whether this is the license you are actively using by selecting "Yes" or "No." If you currently hold multiple licenses, this selection helps determine which one should be prioritized in processing. Choosing "Yes" confirms that this is your primary, valid license. Selecting "No" indicates that this is a past or secondary license, which may require additional information. Providing the correct response ensures that your records remain up to date and accurately reflect your licensing status.

elements.label: Select your license type
elements.defaultValue:
Select your license type

From the available options, select the category that best describes your license type. This classification helps in organizing your license information and ensuring that it complies with the relevant industry or legal requirements. If you are unsure of your license type, refer to your official documents or consult the issuing authority. The correct selection is important for regulatory compliance, so please review all options before making your choice.

elements.label: License Issued State
elements.defaultValue:
License Issued State

Enter the name of the state where your license was issued. If applicable, use either the full name or the official abbreviation to avoid errors. This information is necessary for verifying the regional authority that granted your license. If your license was issued at a federal or national level rather than a specific state, ensure that your entry reflects this distinction. Any inconsistencies between this field and your license documentation could lead to delays in verification.

elements.label: Commercial License?
elements.defaultValue:
Commercial License?

If your license is classified as a commercial license, select "Yes." Otherwise, you may leave this option unselected or choose "No," if available. This designation is crucial for distinguishing between standard and commercial licensing requirements, which may have different regulations and renewal conditions. If you are unsure whether your license is considered commercial, check your official licensing documents or contact the issuing authority for clarification. Selecting the correct option ensures that your license is processed according to the applicable legal standards.

elements.label: End Date *

elements.defaultValue:
You are entering a new historical record.

Please ensure all required fields marked with an asterisk (*) are correctly filled. Double-check the dates, school information, and training details before saving.
